What We Do

About Goldenbird

Goldenbird brings first hand knowledge of building early stage startups into market leaders.

Market Analysis

Define, Target, Hire. How-to and when. Create a dynamic go-to-market strategy that you'll actually use at every stage of your growth.

Monetization Model

Build. Price. Sell. You've built your product, but you're unsure of what your market will bear. Stop leaving money on the table.

Sales Operations

CRM. Sales Process. Marketing Automation. Build a meaningful data architecture that will be the backbone of your business as it scales.

Deal Management

Inspire. Control. Forecast. Scalable sales practices and unscalable one-on-one account engagement coaching.

Our Philosophy

We're not like most consultants, who measure success in cashed paychecks. At Goldenbird, we build partnerships, we don't count logos. Also, we're pretty sure we can beat you at StarCraft.

Ownership

Your success is our success. Your failures are our failures. Every client should realize value from day one.

Battle Tested

We don't hide behind spreadsheets and theories. What we say is what we've done.

The Right Questions

Why compromise your own Philosophy? We enable the right practices while staying true to your values.
